Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create the cards of the memory game. Thera are some methods that give some characteristics in each card. Each card represents a letter.
    Author:
    Giorgos Giannios

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card()
      Creates a card and set it as closed and unpaired.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getIsOpen()
      Returns true if it is opened and false if it is closed.
      boolean getIsPaired()
      Returns true if it is paired and false if it is unpaired
      int getValue()
      Returns the letter of the card
      void setIsOpen(boolean mode)
      Set the card as opened or as closed
      void setPairedTrue()
      Set the card as paired
      void setValue(int value)
      Set the letter that is represented by the card
